tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE museum_collections (
    collection_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    collection_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    curator_name VARCHAR(100),
    creation_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE exhibitions (
    exhibition_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    exhibition_name VARCHAR(255),
    exhibition_description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    exhibition_location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE Artifacts (
    artifact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    artifact_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    collection_id INT,
    exhibition_id INT,
    description TEXT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_collection_id FOREIGN KEY (collection_id) REFERENCES Collections(collection_id),
    CONSTRAINT fk_exhibition_id FOREIGN KEY (exhibition_id) REFERENCES Exhibitions(exhibition_id)
);

CREATE TABLE artworks (
    artwork_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    artwork_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    artist_name VARCHAR(255),
    collection_id UUID,
    creation_year INT,
    description TEXT
);
